versions.versionNotes: Initial version - Extracts and structures email information for analysis

schema.prompt:
Parse and extract structured information from email content:

Email Content: {{input.emailContent}}
Additional Context: {{input.additionalContext}}

Extract and structure email information:

1. Basic Email Elements:
   - Subject line analysis
   - Sender information
   - Recipient details
   - Date and time
   - Email thread context

2. Content Structure:
   - Main message body
   - Key paragraphs
   - Quoted/forwarded content
   - Signature blocks
   - Attachments mentioned

3. Communication Intent:
   - Primary purpose
   - Requested actions
   - Information sharing
   - Questions asked
   - Deadlines mentioned

4. Contact Information:
   - Names mentioned
   - Phone numbers
   - Email addresses
   - Organizations
   - Meeting details

5. Action Items:
   - Explicit requests
   - Implied tasks
   - Follow-up requirements
   - Response deadlines
   - Next steps

6. Context Clues:
   - Urgency indicators
   - Importance markers
   - Emotional tone
   - Formality level
   - Relationship type

7. Data Extraction:
   - Dates and times
   - Numbers and amounts
   - Links and references
   - Project names
   - Document names

Return as structured JSON with keys: basicElements (object), contentStructure (object), communicationIntent (object), contactInfo (array), actionItems (array), contextClues (object), extractedData (object).

props.placeholder: Paste the full email content to parse...
Any relevant context about the email or conversation

translations.description: Extracts and structures information from email content for analysis and processing
translations.instructions: Enter email content to parse. The system will extract key elements, action items, contact information, and context for further processing.
translations.name: Email Parser
